resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76118</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76118</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>dd7cef13-475a-41f5-b8ce-1109adb8bb4f#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A Velencei-tó látképe</string>
            <string language="en">Panorama of Lake Velence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Panorama von See Velence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Panorama de lac Velence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Panorama do lago Velence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Panorama del lago Velence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πανόραμα της λίμνης Velence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Panorama del lago Velence</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Velencei-tavon jól látható a feltöltődése egyik következménye, a nádasok terjeszkedése</string>
            <string language="en">On Lake Velence one of the results of accretion is fully visible, the expansion of reeds</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">tófeltöltődés,  szukcesszió,  nádas,  nyílt víz,  sásos,  </string>
            <string language="en">lake accretion, succession, reeds, open water, sedges</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auf See ist Velence eins der Resultate der 
Zunahme, die Expansion der Schilfe völlig sichtbar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sur le lac Velence un des résultats de 
l'augmentation est entièrement visible, l'expansion des roseaux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">No lago Velence um dos resultados do accretion é
inteiramente visível, a expansão das lingüetas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sul lago Velence uno dei risultati 
dell'accrescimento è completamente visibile, l'espansione delle 
canne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στη λίμνη Velence ένα από τα αποτελέσματα της 
προσαύξησης είναι πλήρως ορατό, η επέκταση των καλάμων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En el lago Velence uno de los resultados del 
aumento es completamente visible, la extensión de cañas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Seezunahme, Reihenfolge, Schilfe, geöffnetes Wasser, 
Seggen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">augmentation de lac, succession, roseaux, l'eau ouverte,
carex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">accretion do lago, sucessão, lingüetas, água aberta,
sedges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">accrescimento del lago, successione, canne, acqua 
aperta, carici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσαύξηση λιμνών, διαδοχή, κάλαμοι, ανοικτό ύδωρ, 
sedges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aumento del lago, sucesión, cañas, agua abierta, 
juncias</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76118</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=dd7cef13-475a-41f5-b8ce-1109adb8bb4f&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
